vfdr

Class VfdrRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • vfdr.VfdrRule

  • public class VfdrRule
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rule for the Vfdr algorithm. Rules are made of a conjunction of antecedents, and a set of sufficient statistics. Sufficient statistics determine the strategy used to classify instances.
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Clément Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)
    See Also:
    SufficientStats

        Expands a rule according to its sufficient statistics.

        Returns:

        public double computeHoeffding(double range,
                               double confidence,
                               double weight)
        Computes the Hoeffding bound for the given parameters
        Parameters:
        range - Range of the split metric
        confidence - Confidence threshold
        weight - Weight of the observations made so far with this rule

        Hoeffding bound
